evidence.claim: Evoke Melt lists AWS services like Lambda and S3 in their technical documentation.
The company adheres to HIPAA guidelines for data security and privacy.
Integration with human resource management platforms through RESTful APIs is mentioned in their engineering sections.
FHIR implementation details can be found in their health-tech documentation.
Uses X12 transaction sets for electronic data interchange in healthcare operations.

icp.icp_reason: Company's tech stack includes HIPAA compliance and X12 EDI, suggesting relevance to healthcare data exchange.
